game_description: 13 Sports in 1 Game ! ■ A variety of sports titles experiences - Baseball, Archery, Ping Pong, Basketball, Bowling, Badminton, Golf, Dart, Billiard, Boxing, Tennis, Volleyball, squash ■ Real time PvP by multiplay ■ Realistic virtual sports experiences by advanced physics ■ Player customization ■ Simple UI and easy control can help anyone to play ■ 5 different difficulties from beginner to professional * The game format is the same as the official Olympic rules, so you can learn sports training and rules. * Suitable for virtual reality sports classrooms that must be conducted indoors due to physical education facilities and weather conditions.
Languages: English, Chinese (China), Chinese (Hong Kong), French (France), German, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese (Portugal), Russian, Spanish (Spain), Turkish

review_2: There are a good variety of sports to play, with live opponents or AI. The level of realism makes the actual play exciting and challenging. While the environments are more like cartoons than pro stadiums, the animation is amusing, colorful and add to the fun of the games. Good luck.
review_3: A great game to enjoy a variety of sports www oculus com /app re ferrals /LJWHJ/3840611616056575
review_4: This is a Favorit for the real App Store for me. But why have we not the All in one Sports SUMMER edition ?
review_5: I love it but for boxing you should be able to punch in the stomach. And in baseball my favorite sport in it and irl. Hitting homeruns shouldn’t be as easy as it is you just swing slow. You should make it based on bat speed and bat path. Also you should choose which hand the bat is in. I love this game!
